蒍字的基本解释

蒍
wěi
同“蔿”。

蒍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》韋委切，上紙，云。］
亦作“蒍1”。
(1)芡实的茎。
(2)古地名。有二处：一为春秋时楚国邑名；一为春秋时郑国邑名。
(3)姓。春秋楚有蔿掩。见《左传·襄公二十五年》。
[②]［huā］
亦作“蒍2”。
[③]［kuī］
亦作“蒍3”。
[④]［é］
亦作“蒍4”。

蒍字的康熙字典解释

字源演变：

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蒍字的起名意思

同“蔿”，一种草本植物的茎。

Thorium
Basic explanation of words
Thorium
wěi
Same as "蔿".
Thorium
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guang Yun" Wei Wei cut, on paper, cloud. ]
Also known as "蒍1".
(1) The stem of Gorgon.
(2) Ancient place names. There are two places: one is the name of Chu State in the Spring and Autumn Period; the other is the name of Zheng State in the Spring and Autumn Period.
(3) Last name. The Spring and Autumn Period is covered by Chu. See "Twenty-five Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xianggong".
[②]［huā］
Also known as "蒍2".
[③] [kuī]
Also known as "蒍3".
[④] [é]
Also known as "蒍4".
